LanguageData.VCE_CookStewSimple.label: prepare simple stew
LanguageData.VCE_CookStewSimple.description: Prepare a simple uncooked stew quickly made from a few ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookStewFine.label: prepare fine stew
LanguageData.VCE_CookStewFine.description: Prepare a fine uncooked stew assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookStewLavish.label: prepare lavish stew
LanguageData.VCE_CookStewLavish.description: Prepare a lavish uncooked stew. A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this stew nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
